name: Tato Catcher
description:
Controls
WASD to move
Alt + Enter for full screen
Left mouse button to start game and attack 

Objective 
The potatoes has become sentient and are trying to conquer the world. Try to catch as many potatoes to try to delay their starch plan. Walk up to the fleeing potatoes and use your pitchfork to catch them. The more potatoes you get the longer your life will be spared. Good luck out there, we are counting on you!

Gameplay
You capture potatoes with you pitchfork
If you get hit by the flying potatoes you'll be disoriented, and while disorianted your movement will be randomized andyou'll have some stars above your head to inicate that you're dizzy

Gametime
Around a minute or two

General
Made in gamemaker studio 2 for the https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020 game jam.
Used SFX from https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack
Music inspired from Shady Cicada's song "House Down Under"
